mapper.sql: SELECT menu.menu_id menuId,menu.menu_name menuName,menu.parent_id parentId, menu.order_num orderNum, menu.url url,menu.target target, menu.menu_type menuType, menu.visible visible,menu.perms perms, menu.icon icon,menu.create_by createBy,menu.create_time createTime, menu.update_by updateBy,menu.update_time updateTime FROM sys_menu menu
mapper.select:
LEFT JOIN sys_role_menu srm on menu.menu_id = srm.menu_id LEFT JOIN sys_role_user sru on srm.role_id = sru.role_id
visible = #{visible}
AND menu_type != 'M'
AND menu_type != 'F'
and sru.user_id = #{userId}
and menu.menu_name like concat('%',#{menuName},'%')
order by menu.parent_id,menu.order_num
